venue.name: Moda Center
venue.address: 1 N Center Court St, Portland, OR 97227

Courtside.Description: Exclusive access and unparalleled views for the ultimate Trail Blazers experience, directly on the court.
Courtside.View_Quality: Immediate court-level view, immersing fans in the heart of the action.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Interactions with players and a chance for media exposure.
Courtside.Accessibility: Premium access for all guests, including those with mobility needs.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive clubs, complimentary gourmet dining, and VIP services.

Lower_Bowl.Description: Superior sightlines close to the action, offering the perfect blend of view and proximity.
Lower_Bowl.View_Quality: Unobstructed views of the court, ideal for a fully immersive game experience.
Lower_Bowl.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating with additional legroom and premium options.
Lower_Bowl.Accessibility: Convenient entrance with elevator and escalator access to the seating area.
Lower_Bowl.Special_Perks: Premium lounge access and in-seat service for an enhanced game day experience.

Upper_Bowl.Description: Budget-friendly options with a panoramic view, perfect for fans wanting to soak in the game's atmosphere.
Upper_Bowl.View_Quality: Expansive view of the arena, capturing the game's energy and flow.
Upper_Bowl.Unique_Features: A cost-effective way to enjoy Trail Blazers games.
Upper_Bowl.Accessibility: Easy access, with nearby amenities and facilities.
Upper_Bowl.Special_Perks: A great choice for fans looking for an affordable way to experience the excitement.

Suites_and_Club_Seats.Description: An exclusive, private viewing experience with top-tier amenities.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated and intimate viewing with luxurious seating.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Dedicated service, private entrances, and upscale dining options.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Accessibility: VIP access directly to suites and club levels.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Perfect for private gatherings, with custom catering and access to exclusive areas.

restaurants_bars.name: Dr. Jack`s
restaurants_bars.address: 1 N Center Court St, Portland, OR 97227
restaurants_bars.description: Located within the Moda Center, offering a convenient dining option with a variety of foods and drinks.

restaurants_bars.description: A sports bar with a lively atmosphere, known for its large projection screen and great selection of beers.

restaurants_bars.name: Ex Novo Brewing Co.
restaurants_bars.description: Offers a great selection of craft beers and delicious pub food, with a cozy atmosphere for pre-game gatherings.

restaurants_bars.name: Creo Chocolate
restaurants_bars.description: A highly rated chocolate shop and cafe known for its unique chocolate experiences and high-quality products, located a short distance from the Moda Center.

restaurants_bars.name: Boxwood Cafe
restaurants_bars.description: Located within the Crowne Plaza Downtown - Convention Center, offering a variety of American dishes in a comfortable setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Burgerville
restaurants_bars.address: 1135 NE M L King Blvd, Portland, OR
restaurants_bars.description: A regional fast-food chain known for its burgers, fries, and shakes made from locally sourced ingredients.

accommodations.name: Crowne Plaza Portland-Downtown Convention Center
accommodations.description: Offers modern rooms and excellent amenities, conveniently located near the Moda Center.

accommodations.name: Hotel Eastlund
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel with a rooftop restaurant offering panoramic views of the city, close to the Moda Center.

accommodations.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Portland
accommodations.description: Upscale, full-service hotel with a heated outdoor swimming pool, close to the Oregon Convention Center and Lloyd Center Mall.

accommodations.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Portland Downtown/Pearl District
accommodations.description: Upscale, all-suite, extended-stay hotel with a heated indoor swimming pool and kitchen in every suite, located near Portland Union Station.

accommodations.name: Canopy by Hilton Portland Pearl District
accommodations.description: Upper-upscale, downtown hotel in the Pearl District with a 24-hour exercise room and free continental breakfast.

accommodations.name: Hampton Inn & Suites Portland-Pearl District
accommodations.description: Upper-midscale, downtown hotel with an indoor swimming pool and free hot breakfast buffet, located near the Pearl District.

tourist_attractions.name: Lan Su Chinese Garden
tourist_attractions.description: A beautiful and serene spot in the city, showcasing Chinese culture and garden design.

tourist_attractions.name: Portland Art Museum
tourist_attractions.description: The oldest art museum in the Pacific Northwest, offering an impressive array of art and exhibitions.

tourist_attractions.name: Powell`s City of Books
tourist_attractions.description: The world's largest independent bookstore, offering new and used titles across a city block.

tourist_attractions.name: Portland Japanese Garden
tourist_attractions.description: Spanning 12 acres with authentic Japanese garden designs that promote tranquility and harmony.

tourist_attractions.name: Oregon Museum of Science and Industry (OMSI)
tourist_attractions.description: A hands-on science museum with exhibits on technology, health, planet Earth, and more, including a submarine and a planetarium.

tourist_attractions.name: Forest Park
tourist_attractions.address: NW 29th Ave and Upshur St to Newberry Rd, Portland, OR 97210
tourist_attractions.description: One of the country's largest urban parks, offering miles of trails for hiking and exploring the Northwest forest.

tourist_attractions.name: The Grotto
tourist_attractions.description: A Catholic sanctuary set among 62 acres of botanical gardens, offering a place for peace and reflection.

tourist_attractions.name: Oregon Zoo
tourist_attractions.description: Home to nearly 3,000 animals from around the world, with a focus on conservation and education.

tourist_attractions.name: Crystal Springs Rhododendron Garden
tourist_attractions.description: Features over 2,500 rhododendrons, azaleas, and other plants in a picturesque setting with water features.

team_related_activities.name: Trail Blazers Team Store at Moda Center
team_related_activities.address: 1 N Center Court St, Portland, OR 97227
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Portland Trail Blazers merchandise, located within the Moda Center.

team_related_activities.name: Rip City Signings
team_related_activities.description: Attend autograph sessions with current and former Trail Blazers players. Check the team's official website for schedules and locations.

team_related_activities.name: Spirit of 77
team_related_activities.address: 500 NE Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Portland, OR 97232
team_related_activities.description: A sports bar located near the Moda Center, known for its vibrant atmosphere during Trail Blazers games.

team_related_activities.name: Blazers at Moda Center
team_related_activities.description: Experience the excitement of a live Portland Trail Blazers game at the Moda Center. Check the official NBA website for game schedules and tickets.

team_related_activities.name: Oregon Sports Hall of Fame & Museum
team_related_activities.description: Explore the history of sports in Oregon, including significant moments and memorabilia from the Trail Blazers' history.

options.description: The MAX Light Rail offers extensive connectivity to the Moda Center with three lines (Red, Blue, and Green) stopping at the Rose Quarter Transit Center. This central hub is just a short walk from the arena, providing a convenient and quick option for attendees traveling from various parts of the city and its suburbs, including direct routes from Portland International Airport via the Red Line.

The Rose Quarter area is well-served by several TriMet bus lines, including routes 4, 8, 35, and 44, which stop at the Rose Quarter Transit Center. This network ensures efficient access from different neighborhoods, making the bus a versatile option for reaching the Moda Center.

The Portland Streetcar's A and B loops offer additional access to the Moda Center area, with stops conveniently located within walking distance. This option is particularly useful for those coming from or going to the Pearl District, Northwest Portland, and Portland State University.

Portland's Biketown bike share program features several stations near the Moda Center, providing a healthy, environmentally friendly way to get to the game. Bike lanes and paths connect the arena with the city, making cycling a viable option for fans.

Uber, Lyft, and other rideshare services offer direct drop-off and pick-up locations near the Moda Center, providing a convenient option for those looking for a personal transportation solution without the need to park.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Trail Blazers tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Trail Blazers tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Tickets for weekday games may be less expensive than weekend games. Consider purchasing tickets in advance or looking for last-minute deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid counterfeit tickets. Utilize reputable secondary marketplaces that offer buyer protection. Be wary of purchasing tickets outside the venue.
